Name: Banana Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
30 ml Giffard Banane du Br√©sil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass .
Prepare garnish of banana chunk (cut garnish from centre of banana and place the rest in the blender to make the cocktail).
BLEND all ingredients with 7oz scoop of crushed ice.
Garnish with banana chunk on rim.
Review: A tangy banana drink that's not overly sweet and is more sophisticated than the uninitiated may expect.
History: Legendary Tiki bartender Harry K. Yee is credited with being the first to add banana to a Daiquiri at Henry Kaiser's Hawaiian Village Hotel in Waikiki, Oahu, Hawaii.
